abstract: An engineer who chased after Google for 10 years while at Yahoo is returning to his mission at Microsoft.
snippet: An engineer who chased after Google for 10 years while at Yahoo is returning to his mission at Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: REDMOND, Wash.  Qi Lu knows as well as anyone just how difficult it is to take on Google.

headline.main: A Hired Gun for Microsoft, in Pursuit of Google
headline.print_headline: A Hired Gun for Microsoft, In Dogged Pursuit of Google

abstract: VMware is the leader in software that lets a computer run two or more operating systems at once. It is used mainly to cut costs in data centers, but that is changing.
snippet: VMware is the leader in software that lets a computer run two or more operating systems at once. It is used mainly to cut costs in data centers, but that is changing.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft’s No. 1 rival is a household name, Google. But a strong candidate for No. 2 is a company that is scarcely known outside the technology industry: VMware.

headline.main: Challenging Microsoft With a New Technology
headline.print_headline: Challenging Microsoft With a New Technology

abstract: The VMware-Microsoft battle matters because virtual machine software is a strategic technology that could shape broader markets.
snippet: The VMware-Microsoft battle matters because virtual machine software is a strategic technology that could shape broader markets.
lead_paragraph: I wrote an article Monday on the competition between VMware and Microsoft in virtual machine software. Truth is, this is the sort of story that, by the standards of The New York Times, falls into the realm of subjects geeky but perhaps of broad significance. Sometimes, the importance of plumbing technology extends well beyond the purview of plumbers.

headline.main: VMware vs. Microsoft: It’s About More Than the Plumbing
